title: Australia's central bank sees core inflation stuck above target out past mid-2026
description:
Australia's central bank now sees core inflation staying above its target band out to the middle of 2026.

description:

description:

title: Aussie dollar stuck in low gear despite RBA rate hike talk
description:
The Australian dollar should be flying high, buoyed by a strong economy and talk of interest rate rises next year when other countries including the US are still in easing mode.

Instead, it is stuck trading about US65¢, defying strategists’ expectations and behaving more like a tired commuter than ...

title: The economy is roaring back to life and the RBA may need to act
description:

title: Australia, US, UK & EU imported $510 million worth petroleum products refined from Russian crude in October
description:
Australia, European Union (EU), the UK and the US cumulatively imported more than $1 billion worth of petroleum products in October 2025 from Indian and Turkish refiners, of which more than half was processed from Russian crude oil, revealed the Centre for Research on Energy and Clean Air (CREA).

title: Australia’s most advanced renewable grid is its most secure, but NSW must scramble as it nears “no coal” scenario
description:

title: Australia’s monthly inflation exceeds forecasts
description:

title: Florida GDP, economy passes a European stalwart, targets Australia
description:
Adios, Spain.

title: Australia's economy is 'stuck in a rut' of weak investment and productivity - 23 November 2025
description: Inflation isn't the only drag on Australia's economy. For decades, businesses have been incentivised to pay out profits rather than reinvest them. Alan Kohler explains.

description:

title: Australia's consumer inflation accelerates to 3.8% in October, overshooting estimates
description:
Australia's inflation accelerated in October, exceeding analysts' estimates and rising at its fastest pace in seven months, data from Australian Bureau of Statistics showed Wednesday.

The consumer price index rose 3.8% in October, year on year, marking its fastest pace since April, based on data re...

title: Reserve Bank could raise interest rates as early as May after inflation climbs to 3.8%
description:
The Reserve Bank of Australia could be forced to hike interest rates as early as May, economists say, after inflation climbed to 3.8% in the year to October, from 3.6% in the month before.

title: Rates tipped to rise in 2026 as inflation spikes to 3.8pc
description:
A first interest rate rise in more than two years is on the cards in 2026 after inflation spiked to 3.8 per cent in the year to October, driven by higher electricity and food costs in a blow to the Albanese government’s efforts to contain cost-of-living pressures.

description:

title: RBA could hike interest rates in early 2026 as banks rewrite forecasts
description:

It showed inflation isn't behaving itself.

Headline inflation came in at 3.8 per cent, while underlying or core inflation was at 3.3 per cent.

title: Elevated Australian inflation rules out further interest rate cuts

title: No issues raised with Future Made in Australia by US, Farrell says
description:

title: Australian shares little changed; head for worst November since 2014 on bank rout
description:
Nov 28 (Reuters) - Australian shares were flat in early trade on Friday but were on track for their weakest November in more than a decade, as heavyweight banks tumbled on frothy valuation concerns and strong economic data dampened hopes of near-term policy easing.

description:

title: Wage growth stable, but divergence under the hood in Australia
description:
Key findings

The WPI rose 0.8% q/q in Q3, keeping annual wage growth unchanged at 3.4%. While the WPI is a lagging indicator, the stability supports our view that the labour market remains tight.
